Name: UniverCity
About the game: UniverCity is an isometric university management game. Manage your staff, professors and students and try and build the best UniverCity around! Build up your UniverCity solo or against friends and build many different types of classes whilst trying to ensure students get good grades, or maybe just try and build the best looking UniverCity.
Meta Title: UniverCity: Feb 1, 2020, Matthew Collins and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on UniverCity? Check out the release date (Feb 1, 2020), developer insights from Matthew Collins, and a complete game summary.
